description: An example resource schema demonstrating some basic constructs and validation rules.

Validators.description: A list of methods for validating the configuration.

Type.description: AWS AppConfig supports validators of type JSON_SCHEMA and LAMBDA.
Type.markdownDescription:
AWS AppConfig supports validators of type JSON_SCHEMA and LAMBDA.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

Content.description: Either the JSON Schema content or the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an Lambda function.
Content.markdownDescription:
Either the JSON Schema content or the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an Lambda function.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 32768  
Update requires: No interruption

Validators.markdownDescription:
A list of methods for validating the configuration.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Tags.description: Metadata to assign to the configuration profile. Tags help organize and categorize your AWS AppConfig resources. Each tag consists of a key and an optional value, both of which you define.

Value.description: The tag value can be up to 256 characters.
Value.markdownDescription:
The tag value can be up to 256 characters.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Key.description: The key-value string map. The tag key can be up to 128 characters and must not start with aws:.
Key.markdownDescription:
The key-value string map. The tag key can be up to 128 characters and must not start with aws:.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^(?!aws:.)[a-zA-Z0-9 +=._:/-]*$  
Update requires: No interruption

Tags.markdownDescription:
Metadata to assign to the configuration profile. Tags help organize and categorize your AWS AppConfig resources. Each tag consists of a key and an optional value, both of which you define.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

LocationUri.description: A URI to locate the configuration. You can specify the AWS AppConfig hosted configuration store, Systems Manager (SSM) document, an SSM Parameter Store parameter, or an Amazon S3 object.
LocationUri.markdownDescription:
A URI to locate the configuration. You can specify the AWS AppConfig hosted configuration store, Systems Manager (SSM) document, an SSM Parameter Store parameter, or an Amazon S3 object.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Update requires: Replacement

Type.description: The type of configurations contained in the profile. When calling this API, enter one of the following values for Type: AWS.AppConfig.FeatureFlags, AWS.Freeform
Type.markdownDescription:
The type of configurations contained in the profile. When calling this API, enter one of the following values for Type: AWS.AppConfig.FeatureFlags, AWS.Freeform

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z\.]+  
Update requires: Replacement

KmsKeyIdentifier.description: The AWS Key Management Service key identifier (key ID, key alias, or key ARN) provided when the resource was created or updated.
KmsKeyIdentifier.markdownDescription:
The AWS Key Management Service key identifier (key ID, key alias, or key ARN) provided when the resource was created or updated.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^[\da-f]{8}-[\da-f]{4}-[\da-f]{4}-[\da-f]{4}-[\da-f]{12}|alias/[a-zA-Z0-9/_-]{1,250}|arn:aws[a-zA-Z-]*:kms:[a-z]{2}(-gov|-iso(b?))?-[a-z]+-\d{1}:\d{12}:(key/[0-9a-f-]{36}|alias/[a-zA-Z0-9/_-]{1,250})$  
Update requires: No interruption

Description.description: A description of the configuration profile.
Description.markdownDescription:
A description of the configuration profile.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 1024  
Update requires: No interruption

Validators.description: A list of methods for validating the configuration.
Validators.markdownDescription:
A list of methods for validating the configuration.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

RetrievalRoleArn.description: The ARN of an IAM role with permission to access the configuration at the specified LocationUri.
RetrievalRoleArn.markdownDescription:
The ARN of an IAM role with permission to access the configuration at the specified LocationUri.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 20  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: ^((arn):(aws|aws-cn|aws-iso|aws-iso-[a-z]{1}|aws-us-gov):(iam)::\d{12}:role[/].*)$  
Update requires: No interruption

ApplicationId.markdownDescription:
The application ID.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Pattern: [a-z0-9]{4,7}  
Update requires: Replacement

Tags.description: Metadata to assign to the configuration profile. Tags help organize and categorize your AWS AppConfig resources. Each tag consists of a key and an optional value, both of which you define.
Tags.markdownDescription:
Metadata to assign to the configuration profile. Tags help organize and categorize your AWS AppConfig resources. Each tag consists of a key and an optional value, both of which you define.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

Name.description: A name for the configuration profile.
Name.markdownDescription:
A name for the configuration profile.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

ConfigurationProfileId.markdownDescription:
The configuration profile ID

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

KmsKeyArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name of the AWS Key Management Service key to encrypt new configuration data versions in the AWS AppConfig hosted configuration store. This attribute is only used for hosted configuration types. To encrypt data managed in other configuration stores, see the documentation for how to specify an AWS KMS key for that particular service.
KmsKeyArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name of the AWS Key Management Service key to encrypt new configuration data versions in the AWS AppConfig hosted configuration store. This attribute is only used for hosted configuration types. To encrypt data managed in other configuration stores, see the documentation for how to specify an AWS KMS key for that particular service.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 20  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: arn:(aws[a-zA-Z-]*)?:[a-z]+:([a-z]{2}((-gov)|(-iso(b?)))?-[a-z]+-\d{1})?:(\d{12})?:[a-zA-Z0-9-_/:.]+  
Update requires: No interruption
